title: [Princess Alexandra in Hong Kong]
creator_credit: British Information Services and Warner-Pathe News
brief_description: Highlights of Princess Alexandra’s visit to Hong Kong during November-December 1961. Records some of the formal engagements of the tour and some informal occasions when the Princess was the guest of the Chinese community.
